Description_lang: A shard of the target's soul inflicts $s1 Shadow damage every $t1 sec., reduces movement speed by $s2%, and damage and healing done by $s3% until the target collects their soul shard.
AuraDescription_lang: $s1 Shadow damage inflicted every $t1 sec, movement speed reduced by $s2%, and damage and healing done reduced by $s3% until you collect your shattered soul shards or run 30 yrds. away from them.
